LanguageData.GhostGearThrown_Dart.label: Ghost Dart
LanguageData.GhostGearThrown_Dart.description: This dart is used mostly to deliver high concentrations of mechanite nerve toxin by injection.
LanguageData.GhostGearThrown_Dart.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.GhostGearThrown_Knife.label: Ghost Throwing knife
LanguageData.GhostGearThrown_Knife.description: A small sharp blade mainly used as a projectile that also delivers mechanite nerve toxin.
LanguageData.GhostGearThrown_Knife.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.GhostGearThrown_Shuriken.label: Ghost Shuriken
LanguageData.GhostGearThrown_Shuriken.description: Shuriken, thrown star like projectiles that can also deliver mechanite nerve toxin.
LanguageData.GhostGearThrown_Shuriken.tools.0.label: point
